name: Titanium.Network.BonjourBrowser
summary: A browser for the discovery and retrieval of Bonjour services available on the network.

events.name: updatedservices
events.summary: Fired when the discovered services list is updated

properties.name: services
properties.summary: An array of BonjourService objects corresponding to currently available services. If you cache this value, including using it as table data, be aware that it could become out of date at any time due to the asynchronous nature of Bonjour service discovery.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: True if the event will try to bubble up if possible.

properties.name: cancelBubble
properties.summary: Set to true to stop the event from bubbling.

methods.name: search
methods.summary: Conduct a search for Bonjour services matching the type and domain specified during creation

properties.name: domain
properties.summary: The domain the browser is searching in

properties.name: isSearching
properties.summary: Whether or not the browser is currently searching

properties.name: serviceType
properties.summary: The type of the service the browser searches for
